title: Enhancing e-Learning Practical Competencies: Strengthening Higher-Order Thinking Skills Through Online Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science knowledge and online communication experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners complete a social issue analysis project using online collaboration tools with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners write a comprehensive interpretive report on complex social phenomena using web-based information processing tools.
Learners engage in at least three constructive feedback exchanges through peer assessment on an online discussion platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
